title: Manage your eGLD Stake
text: This template is ready to use, so you don't need to change anything at a component level, unless you want to customize the default styling.
sections: With our dedicated dashboard, tracking your rewards is a breeze!
You can easily connect using your web wallet or Ledger device.

bullets.content: Annual Percentage Yield. Paid daily at 14:23 UTC
Compound your rewards - no minimum value
